welcome: Hey there! I’m Blaze, your design assistant for BrandBlitz. How can I assist you today, {{name}}?

sign_up_email_error: Hmm, that doesn’t look like a valid email. Try again with something like 'user@example.com'.
sign_up_password_prompt: Great! Now, enter a password (minimum 8 characters).
sign_up_password_error: Password must be at least 8 characters long. Try again!
sign_up_confirm_prompt: Almost there! Please confirm your password.

schedule_call_error: Sorry, I couldn’t understand that. Please specify 'Tomorrow 10 AM' or 'Tomorrow 2 PM'.
